data.text:
The Semiannual Race Meet is held by the school a few times a 
year, to encourage students to challenges themselves and grow. 
It looked like Meisho Doto just got invited to participate, but―
Right, then, without further ado, let's schedule our joint rehearsal! Tomorrow, on the turf course, at 1 PM! I'll see you there, Doto! HAAAAH-HAHAHAHA!
data.name: T.M. Opera O

data.text:
........... 
....Oh, I must have passed out from the shock....
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: Umm, yes, I'm fi... Wait, O- Opeope- Opera O-san picked m-m-m-me!? She wants to compete with me!? Eeehhh?!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
She seemed completely out of her element when speaking to 
T.M. Opera O. As if, until now, she had only looked up to her from 
afar... If I had to guess――

choices.text: Are you a fan of hers?
Are you a fan of hers?

data.text:
N- no... I could never, I'm not worthy...! 
I'm not a fan, but, um, basically, I- I admire her, I guess...
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: Umm, umm... So... The... The first time I saw Opera O-san...――
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: HAAAHH-HAHAHA! See how the walls and lectern have been decorated! See how the gallery has assembled in this gymnasium! Surely they are here to receive my enrollment!
data.name: T.M. Opera O

data.text:
...Opera O-san stood out so much that day. She was laughing 
so loud when us new students were in line. It really set her 
apart. Then...
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: Feast your eyes! This is where my Victory Road will――
data.name: T.M. Opera O

data.text: She fell over in a big way.
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: A- Are you okayyyy....!?
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
I got so shaken up...! We'd only just enrolled, and she fell over in 
front of the whole school! If it happened to me, I'd have 
nightmares about it all year! But she――
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: Hehe... HAAHH-HAHAHAHA! EXCELLENT! What misfortune could be more impactful than that? Coincidental, but still, magnificent!
data.name: T.M. Opera O

data.text:
(W-wow... She didn't let it get to her at all... 
She's actually even more confident than before... Why...?)
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: (I... want to be like her...!)
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: ...Opera O-san picked me, but it was maybe.... No, probably... No, surely... No, definitely a coincidence...
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: But, if even I can help Opera O-san... I-I'll do my very best...!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: The next day. Out of curiosity, I went to observe the two at their "joint rehearsal" (i.e. paired practice). But――

HAAAAHAHA! To think she'd be half an hour late for our first 
day!
data.name: T.M. Opera O

data.text:
The worry crossed my mind that, with the way Meisho Doto was, 
she might have goofed up somewhere. Right at that moment――
I- I'm sorry～!!!!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
So-sorry, I took too long getting ready...! 
I-I'll get to the gate right now! Sorry, so sorry....!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
Just a moment, Doto. 
Do you truly think you're in a worthy state to run?
data.name: T.M. Opera O

data.text: Eek! Y-y-you're right, I'm not...! S-sorry――
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: You're wearing slippers, you know.
data.name: T.M. Opera O

data.text: She left scrambling to the dorms to get her shoes――
...and then night fell.
HAAAHAHAHA! She's late!
data.name: T.M. Opera O

data.text:
Way too late. 
Something must have happened to her, I thought. And right 
then...
I-I-I-I-I-I'm soooooorrrryyyyy～～!!!!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: I'm sorry I'm sorry, I'm so, SO sorry....!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
So... I was looking forward to today so much last night, so I 
polished my shoes... And I didn't put them back in the usual 
spot. Then I lost them...!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: They're not here, not here, not here, not here, not here either! They're not anywheeerrreee!?
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: And, right when I finally found them――
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
Th-th-th-the racing plate broke...! 
Whyyyy!?
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: ...W-what if it's because I spent all night hammering it to get it just right, and then all that hammering made the holes get too... I- I'm so stupiiiiiiid!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
A-and then, by the time I bought new shoes, it was already so 
late...! I'm so so sorry for making you wait...!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
Oh! Y-you're right...! I could've done that all along... W-wait, no! 
What's important is that I made trouble for you! I'm sorryyy...!
data.name: Meisho Doto

choices.text: How about we just call it a day?

data.text:
It was already late at night. I was about to say that surely it was 
too late, even for T.M. Opera O――

Heh, a little accident like this is no reason for the "Overlord" to 
waver! Can you see? The moon smiles on us tonight, as well! 
So come, let's run!
data.name: T.M. Opera O

data.text: O- Opera O-saaan...!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
(A- at the very least, I need to be a good running partner...! 
I need to be the kind of Umamusume that can help her...!)
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
Heh, you've got a good look about you, Doto! 
But I'm not going to lose! ――Haaaah!
data.name: T.M. Opera O

data.text: ...! Y-YAAAAHHH~!!!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: ――Hwuh?!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
...Phew! So, Doto, my good nemesis, how do you like my runni― 
Oh? You fell...?
data.name: T.M. Opera O

data.text:
I- I'm sorry~~! I was late, I made you wait, and I can't even give 
you a proper raaaace~!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
Wh-what do I do, how do I make it up to you...?! 
Oh, right! Drinks, I brought some drinks...!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
Though getting everything ready made me even later... 
I'm sorry......
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
So with that, we were about to accept the drinks Doto brought 
for us, but――

This... 
This isn't hot coffee, it's hot soy sauce!
data.name: T.M. Opera O

data.text: S-S-Soy sauce!? I- I'm so sorry! Umm, uhhhm, well, I- I also got some scented towels ready! They should smell really good――
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: ――!? Cough! Hggck! What a foul... stench――
data.name: T.M. Opera O

data.text: Hyaaa!? Are you all right? All you all riiight, Opera O-saaaaann～～?!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
Sniff.... Sniff....! 
I can't believe... Opera O-san really fainted...
data.name: Meisho Doto

choices.text: She wasn't seriously hurt, so don't worry.
choices.processed: <size=39>She wasn't seriously hurt, so don't worry.</size>

data.text:
But... even though I tried to do my best, I... 
I really can't do anything right... All I do is make trouble... 
Sniff...
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text: I really... I really am such a useless and clumsy and stupid Umamusumeeeeee!
data.name: Meisho Doto

data.text:
She must have been very motivated to take on today's practice, 
with how much preparation she did. As she ran away in tears, I 
couldn't help but go after her in concern.
